import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-supplier-card', templateUrl: './create-supplier-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-supplier-card.component.css'] }) export class createSupplierCardComponent { @Output() CloseForm: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter(); OnCloseForm(){ this.CloseForm.emit(false); } }
